extendedInfo.description: CLARIFICATION this app might not work on small screen device..***DISCLAIMER: This is not the official app of MMDA and MRT3******FYI***âMake sure to have a strong INTERNET connection.âSometimes the main source of the live feeds is offline so wala tlga kayong makikita.âMMDA stream sometimes or most of the time is slow.âPlease wait for the page to load completely :)âNot all device is compatible it "MAY" or "MAY NOT"work.âIF the page does not load please tap  REFRESH on the top RIGHT Corner. OR EXIT from the application.â Uninstall/ Reinstall sometimes fix the issue.â Double Tap to Zoom in and zoom out (camera feed)ââââââââââââWatch LIVE video stream from MMDA Traffic cams.EDSA- Taft, Ayala, Orense, SM Megamall, White Plains, P. TUAZON, Nepa Qmart, C5 Green Meadows, Marcos Highway.âWatch Live video stream from MRT3 Stations CCTV cams.North Ave., Quezon Ave.; Kamuning Ave., Cubao Station, Santolan Station, Ortigas Station, Shaw Boulevard, Boni Ave., Guadalupe Station, Buendia Station, Ayala Station, Magallanes Station, Taft Ave.âGet the LATEST Tweets from @MMDA @dost_pagasa @dotcmrt3âSearch traffic updates from netizens viaTrafficdito.com(im not affiliated with trafficdito.com)âGoogle Map included( find your exact location)Refrence:http://mmda.nowplanet.tv/http://www.mmda.gov.phhttp://dotcmrt3.gov.ph/cctv.phphttp://m.trafficdito.comKEYWORDS: MMDA, MRT, Philippine Traffic, stream, gma7, DOTC, abs cbn, Makati, manila, update, monitor traffic, live cam, real time, cctv, Philippines, Pinoy, Social Pinoy, artista, transportation, pag-asa, weather

reviews.title: superb!
reviews.comment: live stream talaga! works on my Galaxy Note II LTE im kn my unlisurf pero mabilis,,as in live stream pero not totally walang lag peto useful ito! lalo na kung gusto mo makita kung makakahabol ka pa sa mrt or need mo saan onti ang tao para makaiwas sa rush hour,, is this legal? pero sana wag magamit sa masama ito,,pero astig to! thanks devs for this useful app! free pa! lupet!!! :D
reviews.author: kristian asuncion

reviews.title: zzzzzzzzzzzz
reviews.comment: you most likely to install this on a 4 to 5 inch phone but the ads plus the interface will take most of the screen... uninstalling this on my phone will try on a 7 inch tablet
reviews.author: Joseph Fiesta

reviews.title: Ayos!
reviews.comment: I highly recommend people to have this app. It\'s been helping me quite a lot since I had this. Please have the Taft station properly linked though. Magallanes lumalabas. Aside from that, this app\'s essential to every Filipino commuter. Thanks to the developer! Sobrang na-appreciate ko \'to. Ayos eh. Kudos! :D
reviews.author: Mark Pascual

reviews.comment: Works on my alcatel OT 4030e (JellyBean) and smart wifi (54Mbps only). 2 downloads for today
